EmailTemplate.description: Reassuring customers their data has not been compromised
EmailTemplate.name: Data Security_Equifax
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Solar Not Impacted by Equifax Breach
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A note on data security
Please be assured that your personal data with BlueWave has NOT been impacted by the Equifax data breach.
BlueWave works with TransUnion for our consumer credit services, which was not impacted by this event. As a consumer loan provider, we take matters of data protection seriously and will always remain transparent with you, our customers.
We are sending this message in light of the news this morning regarding the cyberattack compromising Equifax.
If you would like to speak directly with our credit reporting agency, please feel free to reach out to TransUnion: 1.800.680.7289
If you have any questions regarding BlueWave's data security or your Solar loan, please feel free to reach out to us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or give us a call at 844.786.4100.
Thanks for trusting BlueWave to provide you with innovative solar services.
- All of us here at BlueWave customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100. Weâ€™re happy to help.
Our mailing address is: 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
